name: Broken Egg
description:
The game started as a game jam from me and Pablo when we were roommates in June 2015. Then it lay dormant until 2021, when I dug it out to "finish" it and turn it into a birthday present for him. It cost a lot of nerves, it's a little broken and buggy, it could use a LOT more polish (specially on the audio side) but I learned a ton while working on it and I'm proud of the little thing :)

Credits

Art by Pablo (@kednar)

Code by Milan (@milanpingel)

Sounds by writingduels on itch,  Reitanna, Breviceps, algemaate, Nakhas, Rudmer_Rotteveel on freesounds.org

Special Thanks to Arthur (@CatboyGame), Jonathan (@retrific) and Mimpy from the GM Discord for their help fixing bugs! <3
